life_date: Daniel Ridgway Knight, American, Chambersburg, Pennsylvania, 1839–Paris or Rolleboise 1924
medium: Oil on canvas laid down on board
signed: LRC in brown: D. Ridgway Knight / Paris 1879
text: In this painting several women, one man, and two children work and frolic in a grape field harvesting and seeming to enjoy their work. A wagon is depicted in the background on the right of center ready to take a haul away. The hill upon which the grapes grow slopes downward to the right side of the painting to reveal a distant village, a church spire rising above.
title: La Vendange
